content: Hello. I am from Faroe Islands / Denmark. 19 Years, healthy and well fit for combat. I would like to enlist to the US Army. But I don't know how to enlist as a foreigner. Does the US army provide support for travel expenses to US traning facilities from Europe? How do I do? Thanks for your help.
reply: Hello. I am from Faroe Islands / Denmark. 19 Years, healthy and well fit for combat. I would like to enlist to the US Army. But I don't know how to enlist as a foreigner. Does the US army provide support for travel expenses to US traning facilities from Europe? How do I do? Thanks for your help.
title: Joining the Army as an European.

content: Yes you can. You can also work towards American Citizenship, if that is your goal - - Try the Army Recruiting Forum: http://forums.military.com/eve/forums/a/frm/f/4300004251001 Wandering and Wondering
reply: Yes you can. You can also work towards American Citizenship, if that is your goal - - Try the Army Recruiting Forum: http://forums.military.com/eve/forums/a/frm/f/4300004251001 Wandering and Wondering
title: Joining the Army as an European.
